resources.string:
3 Steps to get your favorite photo/video from Instagram(1st and 2nd steps can be swapped)

 1. Open InstaMe

 2. Open your Instagram, choose Copy Share URL on photo/video you like

 3. Back to InstaMe, you will see the photo/video in the list. You can save, share or set wallpaper as you wish.
You need to allow access to your storage, So we can save the picture
Now You can save, share or set wallpaper as you wish. Enjoy!
Image has been saved already, you can see it in your album
Video has been saved already, you can see it in your album
